customValues.infoDesc:
Janice is walking on the road along with Christopher, in search of finding any information about a recent attack. Shortly after, Chris disappears without a trace and Janice thinks it's some kind of joke. When Janice finds him, she sees a Mimic atop of him, feasting on his corpse. Janice runs away as fast as she can and screams for help.



Based on Vita Carnis by Darian Quilloy.
